Title: Bright Future
Actors: Joe Odagiri, Tadanobu Asano, Tatsuya Fuji, Takashi Sasano
Plot: Two young guys work in a plant that manufactures oshibori (those moist hand-towels found in some Japanese restaurants). Their weird bond is based on uncontrollable rage--something neither can articulate or control--and the strange jellyfish that they keep as a pet.
